column2: Express, Inc. engages in the provision of apparel brand for both women and men. The company is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio and currently employs 15,700 full-time employees. The firm targets women and men between 20 and 30 years old. The company offers an assortment of fashionable apparel and accessories to address fashion needs across multiple aspects of lifestyles, including work, casual, jeanswear and going-out occasions. The company is engaged in the operation of its brick-and-mortar retail and outlet stores, e-commerce operations and franchise operations. The company sells its products through its e-commerce Website, www.express.com and its mobile application, and has franchise agreements with franchisees that operate Express locations in Latin America. The company operated 656 stores across the United States, in Canada and in Puerto Rico, including 104 factory outlet stores, as of January 28, 2017. Its products are created by its in-house design team. Its portfolio of apparel products includes brands, such as Portofino shirt, Editor pant and 1MX shirt.
